channel.title: 613/614 error please help
channel.description:
here is the CLIENT CMD ERROR:
Error: java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1 java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass ja va.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000 java.net.UR LClassLoader$1.run java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged java.net.URLClass Loader.findClass java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoade r.loadClass java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass client.method79:2087 Applet_Sub1.run :301 java.lang.Thread.run | java.lang.ClassFormatError: Truncated class file | [ 1)0,0,104,104|3)-1|4)0|5)2|6)765,503|7)false|8)0|9)true|10)false|11)false|12)tru e|13)93|14)0]
i presume the client was set the the ip or the source as it was i package. But can u tell me where i can change the ip -Client.java in client the ip -(in source if needed) port- in client port - in source
And lets see if this fixes the error
Thanks, [b]owner of true pk[/b]
